name: Locke's Dungeon
description:
Very special thanks to my Composer/Musician, Collin Robbins     (or whatever he wants to be called), who made all my music.  This type of music isn't his usual music. He makes folksy kinds of stuff that you can find here:   https://open.spotify.com/artist/42yok3YCaVb69OuuUObUR7?si=Us2BJj3JSR-kVvRjBZWlVg...

Wasn't able to finish it, only got one side done. Had I been less ambitious, or made smaller levels (probably what I should've done to show off my ideas) I could've finished the whole thing. I plan to update the game, though, so y'all feel free to donate or leave feedback if you want to see it go further!!

Oh and normally it's both single player and multiplayer, up to you.. ((THIS IS NON FUNCTIONAL RIGHT NOW as one character has nothing to do.))
